Rulings.Goat:
● Are “Lady Panther”, “The Forgiving Maiden”, “Fairy Guardian” or “Crimson Sentry” Multitrigger Effects? 
● A: Nope. Those are all single-trigger Cost Effect monsters. Their Spell Speed is 1, and their effects can only be activated during your own MP 1 or 2.
